string-array.name: minnesota_descriptions
string-array.item: The casserole that’s too hipster to call itself “casserole.”
Minnesotan inception — a cheese-filled beef patty between two buttered buns with more cheese, of course.
Minnesota: where we’re tough enough to eat something soaked in lye for multiple days. They don’t call them Midwestern values for nothing.
This stuff is organic, but don’t worry, we drown it in cheese to give it that special Midwestern touch.
